item.title: EP 917 - The Bloody Boy Behind The Bathroom Door
item.itunes:title: The Bloody Boy Behind The Bathroom Door
item.description:
Today we find out cat poop can make you sexy, try to fight of overpowering alien might, and then sneak in a story about the faceless boy behind the bathroom door!

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-194-the-wand-wielding-loveland-frog

Brain-altering parasite makes infected people MORE attractive to others, study says

https://www.studyfinds.org/parasite-makes-more-attractive/

Toxoplasma gondii

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toxoplasma_gondii
